properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 10:09PM PST until February 8 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Spokane has extended the flood
warning for the following rivers in Idaho...Washington...

Paradise Creek at Moscow affecting Latah and Whitman Counties

Renewed rises on Paradise Creek are expected through the night.

The National Weather Service in Spokane, WA has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Paradise Creek at Moscow.
* until Saturday morning.
* At  9:45 PM Friday the stage was  9.19 feet.
* Flood stage is  9.20 feet.
* River levels at Paradise Creek have been slowly rising this
evening. Additional rainfall will likely push river levels above
flood stage overnight.
* At   9.2 feet...Water will be out of the creek at the intersection
of Bridge Street and Hillcrest Drive and may also be flowing into
the intersection at this stage.
* At   8.8 feet...Water will begin backing up through the storm drains
on Roosevelt Street.
* At   8.4 feet...Water pooling in Mountain View Park on northeast
side of Moscow.
